title: B&R
text:
B&R Industrial Automation GmbH is an <a href="Austria">Austria</a>n <a href="automation">automation</a> and <a href="process%20control">process control</a> technology company. It was founded in 1979 by Erwin Bernecker and Josef Rainer, and is headquartered in <a href="Eggelsberg">Eggelsberg</a>, near <a href="Braunau%20am%20Inn">Braunau</a> in the state of <a href="Upper%20Austria">Upper Austria</a>.
The company specializes in machine and factory control systems, HMI and motion control. In addition to scalable complete solutions, B&R also offers individual components. The product range is oriented toward machinery and equipment manufacturing, and the company is also active in the field of factory and process automation.
In July 2017, the company was acquired by the Swiss <a href="ABB%20Group">ABB Group</a>.
Performance.
B&R concluded 2015 with a revenue of €585 million, a 10% increase over the previous year. In 2014, the company posted growth of 13% to 535 million <a href="euro">euro</a>s. In the same year, B&R opened two new subsidiaries in Japan. and Singapore.
The company's 2013 revenue of 475 million <a href="euro">euro</a>s represented a growth of 11% over the previous year. 2013 also saw the founding of B&R subsidiaries in Turkey and Taiwan.
Locations.
The company headquarters are located in Eggelsberg, Upper Austria. In 1987, the headquarters in Eggelsberg, Austria grew to 7,000 m2. The first building addition there took place in the year 2000, adding an additional 10,000 m2 production plant. In March 2008, the company began a new expansion project. Approximately €50 million were invested to add 50,000 m2 to the headquarters.
B&R is represented by subsidiaries in the following countries: Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Great Britain, India, Italy, Korea, Latvia, Netherlands, Poland, Russian Federation, Sweden, Switzerland, Singapore, Slovakia, Spain, Taiwan, Turkey, Ukraine, USA and Vietnam. Cooperative partnerships expand B&R's presence to over 75 countries worldwide.
